document.full_text: restructuring of sovereign debt in greece would make it impossible for the european central bank to continue using its bonds as collateral in liquidity operations, executive board member juergen stark said.
document.title: stark: ecb would reject greek bonds after restructuring
lines_and_colors: restructuring of sovereign debt in greece would make it impossible for the european central bank to continue using its bonds as collateral in liquidity operations, executive board member juergen stark said.
